Functions
DEBUG_INIT
void DEBUG_INIT()

Initialize Debug module

DEBUG_BREAK
void DEBUG_BREAK()

Force a break point [Emulicious] You need the "Break on ld b, b instruction" exception to be activated.  [openMSX] You need the "tools/script/openMSX/debugger_pvm.tcl" script to be loaded to use thise function.

DEBUG_ASSERT
void DEBUG_ASSERT(
bool a
)

Conditionnal break [Emulicious] You need the "Break on ld b, b instruction" exception to be activated.  [openMSX] You need the "tools/script/openMSX/debugger_pvm.tcl" script to be loaded to use thise function.
